name: Standard Bearer

grantsPowers.name: Banner Of Storms
grantsPowers.description: Group Electricity Damage Override; Electricity Resistance

grantsPowers.name: Rallying Banner
grantsPowers.description: Group Attack Power; Rescue Healing; Slow Cleanse

grantsPowers.name: Bearers Insignia
grantsPowers.description: Passive: Increase Out of Combat Regeneration

grantsPowers.name: Sentinel
grantsPowers.description: Increase Critical Chance when Standing Still

description: A Standard Bearer is a member of a combat group that is responsible for carrying a distinctive mark, often times a flag, as a rallying sign. The added motivation a standard can bring is substantial enough to excite and inspire even the most fatigued of allies while acting as a waypoint for those in their company.
lore: A bearer of a standard can rally even the most weary of squad members.
